skills.name: Kageryuu Blade Art
skills.description: Starts charging energy when sprinting. When the duration of the sprint reaches 0.5s, 1.5s, and 3s, the following Sprint Attack generates an explosion centered on the first enemy hit, dealing 400%, 600%, and 800% ATK of Physical DMG respectively.

skills.name: Sharp Edge
skills.description: When Combo Hit Count is 5 or less, gain 32.0% Physical DMG.
